trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class is a base class for deriving your own data source designer for a custom data source control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.

Other classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> are <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the action list collection for the control designer.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> items for the control designer.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure"></xref> method can be called.
A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Configure** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.
This implementation always returns `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)"></xref> method can be called.
A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Refresh Schema** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.
This implementation always returns `false`.
Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class.
In all cases.
Occurs when any property of the associated data source changes.
Gets the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
The HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.
Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.
The unique path to the block of data to use in creating the view.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> object.

Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event when the properties of the data source have changed and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents"></xref> property value is `false`.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method notifies the designer of each control bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host.

This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `false`.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> object provided by the calling object.

Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> event when the schema of the data source has changed and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents"></xref> property value is `false`.
This method notifies the designers of each control bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed.

This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> object.
Refreshes the schema of the data.
This method is not supported in this class, but is implemented in derived classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class.
This parameter is not used in this implementation.
However, it should be supported in derived classes.
In all cases.
Restores data source events after they have been suppressed.

Data source events can be suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property to `false`, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents"></xref> property is `false`.
Occurs after the schema has been refreshed.
Postpones all data source events until after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents"></xref> method is called.
Indicates whether data source events have been disabled.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> event has been disabled; otherwise, `false`.
